category.name: Design
category.description: Master design principles, user experience, and visual communication techniques.

sub_categories.name: UI/UX Design
sub_categories.description: Learn user interface and user experience design principles and best practices.

exercises.title: Design Systems & Architecture
exercises.description: Master design system architecture and advanced design patterns.

tasks.title: Design Tokens
tasks.question:
What are design tokens in a design system?

Consider: Reusable design decisions
tasks.hint: Think about storing design values as variables
options: Reusable design decisions stored as variables

tasks.title: Component Architecture
tasks.question:
What is atomic design methodology?

Consider: Building design systems from small to large
tasks.hint: Think about atoms, molecules, organisms, templates, and pages
options: Building design systems from atoms to pages

tasks.title: Design System Governance
tasks.question:
What is design system governance?

Consider: Managing and maintaining design systems
tasks.hint: Think about processes for maintaining consistency
options: Processes for maintaining and evolving design systems

exercises.title: Advanced UX Research & Analytics
exercises.description: Master advanced UX research methods and analytics techniques.

tasks.title: User Behavior Analytics
tasks.question:
What is heatmap analysis used for?

Consider: Visualizing user interactions
tasks.hint: Think about showing where users click and scroll
options: Visualizing user interaction patterns on web pages

tasks.title: Conversion Rate Optimization
tasks.question:
What is conversion rate optimization (CRO)?

Consider: Improving user actions
tasks.hint: Think about increasing desired user behaviors
options: Improving the percentage of users who take desired actions

tasks.title: User Experience Metrics
tasks.question:
What is the Net Promoter Score (NPS)?

Consider: Measuring user satisfaction and loyalty
tasks.hint: Think about asking users how likely they are to recommend
options: A measure of user satisfaction and likelihood to recommend
